0x1683E7F0.name: SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_CUSTOM_COLOR
0x1683E7F0.description: Sets custom vehicle xenon lights color, allowing to use RGB palette. The game will ignore lights color set by [\_SET_VEHICLE_XENON_LIGHTS_COLOR](#\_0xE41033B25D003A07) when custom color is active. This native is not synced between players. Requires xenon lights mod to be set on vehicle.

examples.code:
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsUsing(PlayerPedId())
if DoesEntityExist(vehicle) then
  -- Toggle xenon lights mod.
  ToggleVehicleMod(vehicle, 22, true)

  -- Set pink lights color.
  SetVehicleXenonLightsCustomColor(vehicle, 244, 5, 82)
end
